name: HospitalBedSupply
title: Hospital Bed Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Hospital bed durable medical equipment.),(Data Element Scope: Hospital beds classified as durable medical equipment as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Fixed height, variable height, semi-electric, total electric, heavy duty extra wide and extra heavy duty hospital beds.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hospital beds not identified as covered durable medical equipment by US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.)
